Reviews.Title: ASUS K53E-RIN5 intel Core I5-2450M 2.5 GHz 6GB RAM HD-751GB 2.5 sata with DVD and 15.6 " OS win7
Reviews.Author: Don T.
Reviews.Content: ASUS K53E-RIN5 intel Core I5-2450M 2.5 GHz 6GB RAM HD-751GB 2.5 sata with DVD and 15.6 " OS win7 is a very well designed product now catching on with the service industry for high speed functionality and reliability.Don T.

Reviews.Title: computer
Reviews.Author: Olga Vilenskaya
Reviews.Content: I like this model so far. I do not have problems yet. The price is really good. I am recomending this computer to others

Reviews.Title: operating disk
Reviews.Author: chopper
Reviews.Content: The computer is just as they said.  I always get a factory disk and didnt. I didn't get paper work that comes with it and I just assumed it would be with it so be sure to request ecerything or inquire about it so yoi don't half to buy one
